item.title: Amazon : Dash Carts
item.description: It’s a new smart shopping cart that makes a quick grocery trip even quicker by allowing you to skip the checkout line. The cart uses a combination of computer vision algorithms and sensor fusion to identify items you put in the cart. When you exit through the store’s Amazon Dash Cart lane, sensors automatically identify the cart, and your payment is processed using the credit card on your Amazon account.
